description:
The Digg News application allows you to enjoy the Digg news, one of the biggest communities regarding news, directly on your Palm. From Technology, Sport, Entertainment and Business to Lifestyle; get the very latest news, rated by a big community.
The application is easy to use with features such as simple navigation between different topics and areas, and the possibility to define own categories. You can navigate to the original stories in the internet and even share via email. Information is directly taken from the digg.com homepage and always up to date.
The user starts with a simple overview of customizable queries to digg.com to show dedicated areas of interest, e.g. show only the Apple related information, or news about space and science. The list of stories can be filtered according to the digg count (ratings by digg community members) or according to the publication date. The details page provides the full description taken from digg.com, the publication date, and various buttons to navigate to the homepage of the story and to share the information via email.
